00022 int MakeDetectorPulses::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, const TSetupData* gSetup){
00023     IDs::channel detector(IDs::kAnyDetector,IDs::kNotApplicable);
00024     const AnalysedPulseList *slow_pulses;
00025     const AnalysedPulseList *fast_pulses;
00026     SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator current;
00027     //DetectorPulseList *detectorPulses;
00028 
00029     // Loop through paired channels
00030     for (ChannelPairing_t::const_iterator i_detector = fFastSlowPairs.begin();
00031             i_detector != fFastSlowPairs.end(); i_detector++) {
00032         detector=i_detector->first.Channel();
00033 
00034         // find the list of analyzed pulses for the fast channel
00035         current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(i_detector->first);
00036         if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00037             std::cout<<"Unable to find source for fast channel: "<<i_detector->first<<std::endl;
00038             std::cout<<"gAnalysedPulseMap contains:"<<std::endl;
00039             DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(gAnalysedPulseMap);
00040             return 1;
00041         }
00042         fast_pulses=&(current->second);
00043 
00044         // check if the fast_pulses is empty
00045         if(fast_pulses->empty()) {
00046             cout<< "List of TAPs for "<<i_detector->first<<" is empty."<<endl;
00047             continue;
00048         }
00049 
00050         // if the fast and slow sources are the same then pass the slow channel
00051         // as NULL
00052         if(i_detector->first==i_detector->second) slow_pulses=NULL;
00053         else{
00054             current=gAnalysedPulseMap.find(i_detector->second);
00055             if(current==gAnalysedPulseMap.end()){
00056                 std::cout<<"Unable to find source for slow channel: "<<i_detector->second<<std::endl;
00057                 std::cout<<"gAnalysedPulseMap contains:"<<std::endl;
00058                 DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(gAnalysedPulseMap);
00059                 return 1;
00060             }
00061             slow_pulses=&(current->second);
00062             // check if the fast_pulses is empty
00063             if(slow_pulses->empty()) {
00064                 cout<< "List of TAPs for "<<i_detector->second<<" is empty."<<endl;
00065                 continue;
00066             }
00067         }
00068 
00069         fGenerator->ProcessPulses(gSetup,detector.str(),fast_pulses,slow_pulses,gDetectorPulseMap[detector.str()]);
00070     }
00071     return 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 int MakeDetectorPulses::BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, const TSetupData* setup){
00075     // Set up the generator
00076     fGenerator=MakeGenerator(fAlgorithm);
00077     if(!fGenerator) return 1;
00078 
00079     const IDs::channel* ch;
00080     const IDs::generator* gen;
00081     IDs::source partner;
00082     // Find all fast detectors
00083     for (SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator i_source = gAnalysedPulseMap.begin();
00084             i_source != gAnalysedPulseMap.end(); i_source++) {
00085         ch=&i_source->first.Channel();
00086         gen=&i_source->first.Generator();
00087         partner=IDs::source(ch->GetCorrespondingFastSlow(),*gen);
00088         if(gAnalysedPulseMap.count(partner)==0) partner=i_source->first;
00089 
00090         if(ch->isFast()) {
00091             // fast channels go first
00092             fFastSlowPairs.insert(std::make_pair(i_source->first,partner));
00093         }else{ 
00094             // slow channels go second
00095             // if both fast and slow are the same then later there will be
00096             // nothing to do.
00097             fFastSlowPairs.insert(std::make_pair(partner,i_source->first));
00098         }
00099 
00100     }
00101 
00102     if(Debug()){
00103         for( ChannelPairing_t::iterator i=fFastSlowPairs.begin();i!=fFastSlowPairs.end();i++){
00104             std::cout<<"Paired: "<<i->first<<" with "<<i->second<<std::endl;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     return 0;
00108 }

00110 TVDetectorPulseGenerator* MakeDetectorPulses::MakeGenerator(const std::string& generatorType){
00111     // Select the generator type
00112     TVDetectorPulseGenerator* generator=TDPGeneratorFactory::Instance()->createModule(generatorType);
00113     if (!generator){
00114         return NULL;
00115     }
00116     // setup some options on the generator
00117     generator->SetDebug(Debug());
00118     return generator;
00119 }

00121 void MakeDetectorPulses::DumpgAnalysedPulseMap(const SourceAnalPulseMap& aMap){
00122     for(SourceAnalPulseMap::const_iterator it=aMap.begin();
00123             it!=aMap.end(); it++){
00124         cout<<it->first<<" contains "<<it->second.size()<<" TAPs"<<endl;
00125     }
00126 
00127 }
